message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $95. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, considering its worth. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $88 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. I can reduce the price slightly, how about $91?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $89 for the product.
